TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MaskedTextProvider extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 表示遮罩剖析服務，任何支援遮罩的控制項數目都可以使用它，例如 控制項。

span.span: Represents a mask-parsing service that can be used by any number of controls that support masking, such as the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項包含常值字元所組成，而且格式項目，它會測試對所有使用者輸入的遮罩。The control contains a mask, composed of literal characters and formatting elements, that it tests all user input against. 而不是永久關聯特定遮罩剖析引擎，使用，Windows Form 提供它所代表的個別服務為類別，定義的文件中所討論的遮罩語言的語法屬性。Instead of permanently associating a specific mask-parsing engine with , Windows Forms provides it as a separate service, represented by the class, which defines the syntax of the masking language discussed in the documentation for the property. 許多成員的類別參考其實作的相關聯的類似的具名成員。Many of the members of the class refer their implementation to similarly named members of the associated . 例如，屬性類別參考的所有存取的類別。For example, the property of the class refers all access to the of the class. 所使用的遮罩剖析引擎隨附於 Microsoft Visual Basic 版本 6 的遮罩的編輯控制項之後會模型化。The mask-parsing engine used by is modeled after the Masked Edit control included in Microsoft Visual Basic version 6. 它的遮罩語言所述的文件屬性。Its masking language is described in the documentation for the property. 下列三個不同字串所涉及類別。The following three distinct strings are involved with the class. |字串名稱String name|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |輸入的字元或字串Input character or string|代表做為輸入遮罩是套用針對所使用的字元。Represents the characters used as input that the mask is applied against. 事實上，輸入的字串可能由多個輸入的作業，包括， ， ，和。In actuality, the input string may be composed of multiple input operations, including , , , and . 因此，無法直接存取的輸入的字串。Therefore, the input string cannot be accessed directly. 不過，輸入的字串處理層面可透過和， ，和屬性。However, aspects of the input string handling are available though the and , , and properties.| |遮罩Mask|代表格式化遮罩，用來將輸入的字串轉換為格式化的字串輸入。Represents the input formatting mask used to transform the input string into the formatted string. 這個字串中設定，不過主要存取屬性。This string is set in the and accessed primarily though the property. 遮罩的特性也會提供透過其他成員，例如， ，和屬性。Characteristics of the mask are also available through other members, such as the , , and properties.| |格式化的字串Formatted string|表示字串完全遮罩套用至輸入字串時，所造成。Represents the string that results when the full mask is applied to the input string. 格式化的字串可以查詢具有許多成員的類別，包括， ， ， ， ， ，依此類推。The formatted string can be queried with many members of the class, including , , , , , , and so on. 完整格式化字串的值是可從和方法。The full value of the formatted string is available from the and methods.| > [!NOTE] > 輸入的字串可能代表直接使用者輸入，例如狀況，或可能不是直接使用者輸入/輸出作業相關聯的其他程序所產生。The input string may represent direct user input, as in the case of the , or may be generated by other processes not directly associated with user input/output operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式表示的最常見的多載的形式。This constructor represents the most general overloaded form. `mask`參數必須符合所定義的遮罩語言類別，將有詳細說明屬性類別。The `mask` parameter must conform to the masking language defined by the class, which is detailed in the property of the class. 因為無法查詢特定文化特性資訊的中性文化特性建構函式會使用方法來搜尋第一個非中性文化特性，可用來判斷適當的分隔符號字元。Because neutral cultures cannot be queried for culture-specific information, the constructor will use the method to search for the first non-neutral culture to use to determine the proper separator characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將`input`位置之後，最後指派表示的字元格式化字串中的第一個可用位置的值屬性。The method adds the `input` character value to the first available position in the formatted string after the position that was last assigned, which is represented by the property. 這個方法會基於下列原因失敗：This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - 輸入的值， `input`，列印出來，或不符合對應的遮罩項目。The input value, `input`, is not printable, or it does not match its corresponding mask element. - 格式化字串中的零可用編輯位置或之後在上一個指定的位置有無可用編輯位置。There are zero available edit positions in the formatted string, or there are no available edit positions after the last assigned position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將從字元`input`字串來格式化的字串開頭之後的第一個可用位置。The method adds the characters from the `input` string to the formatted string, starting with the first available position after . 這個方法會基於下列原因失敗：This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - 任一字元中輸入的值， `input`，無法列印或輸入的值不符合對應的遮罩項目。Any of the characters in the input value, `input`, are not printable, or the input value does not match its corresponding mask element. - 沒有足夠的可用編輯位置格式字串中最後一個指定的位置之後。There are not enough available edit positions in the formatted string after the last assigned position. 如果此方法失敗，不會加入任何而且方法會傳回`false`。If this method fails, no additions are made and the method returns `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法插入的第一個編輯位置或超出指定的字元`pos`參數。The method inserts a character into the first edit position at or beyond that specified by the `pos` parameter. 這個方法將會轉換現有的所有字元之後的插入點移動一個位置，以騰出供插入`input`字元。This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position to make room for the inserted `input` character. 如果發生下列錯誤之一，不會執行插入，而且方法會傳回`false`。If one of the following errors occurs, the insertion is not performed, and the method returns `false`. - `pos`參數小於零或大於的格式化字串。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 在格式化的字串或超出指定的位置，找不到可編輯的字元`pos`。An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. - 插入字元`input`，因為它不是可列印或不符合對應的遮罩項目不是有效的輸入的字元。The insertion character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element. - 有是右邊的插入點，沒有可用位置，所以無法移動現有的字元。There are no available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted. - 轉換現有的字元將會產生遮罩的違規情形。Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask. 空白`input`字串，會導致沒有變更的格式化字串，但是會傳回`true`。An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將每個字元從`input`字串插入編輯位置位於位置`pos`和更新版本。The method inserts each character from the `input` string into the edit positions located at position `pos` and beyond. 這個方法將會變更所有現有的字元之後插入點移動一個位置，針對每個插入的字元。This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position for each inserted character. 如果發生下列錯誤之一，不會執行插入，而且方法會傳回`false`。If one of the following errors occurs, no insertion is performed, and the method returns `false`. - `pos`參數小於零或大於的格式化字串。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 無法夠編輯字元存在或超出指定的位置，格式化字串中`pos`、 要插入的所有字元從`input`字串。Not enough editable characters exist in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`, to insert all of the characters from the `input` string. - 一或多個插入的字元不是有效的輸入的字元因為它們均無法列印或不符合對應的遮罩項目。One or more of the insertion characters are not a valid input character because they are not printable or do not match their corresponding mask element. - 沒有足夠的可用位置的插入點，右邊，因此無法移動現有的字元。There are not enough available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted. - 轉換現有的字元將會產生遮罩的違規情形。Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask. 請注意，此移位發生在每個個別字元插入期間。Note that this shifting occurs during the insertion of each individual character. 空白`input`字串，會導致沒有變更的格式化字串，但是會傳回`true`。An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的可編輯的第一個位置，或超出指定的位置，格式化字串中搜尋`pos`。The method searches for the first editable position in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. 如果找到一個物件，可編輯的位置的值變更為指定的字元， `input`。If one is found, the value of the editable position is changed to the specified character, `input`. 下列任何一個狀況會導致執行取代作業發生錯誤，而值為`false`傳回：Any of the following conditions will result in an error that causes no replacement to be performed and a value of `false` to be returned: - `pos`參數小於零或大於的格式化字串。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 在格式化的字串或超出指定的位置，找不到可編輯的字元`pos`。An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. - 取代字元`input`，因為它不是可列印或不符合對應的遮罩項目不是有效的輸入的字元。The replacement character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會搜尋第一個可編輯的位置或超出指定的位置， `pos`。The method searches for the first editable position at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. 在假設在這個點之後有足夠的可編輯位置下操作，現有的字元值會被取代--一個取代字串參數的內容`input`。Operating under the assumption that there are enough editable positions after this point, the existing character values are replaced one-by-one with the contents of the replacement string parameter, `input`. 下列條件會被視為錯誤。The following conditions are considered errors. 當錯誤發生時，沒有替代項目，就會發生和傳回`false`。When an error occurs, no replacement occurs and returns `false`. - `pos`參數小於零或大於的格式化字串。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 沒有足夠保存內容的取代字串來格式化字串中可編輯的位置。There are not enough editable positions in the formatted string to hold the contents of the replacement string. - 其中一個取代字元值無效，因為它不是可列印或不符合對應的遮罩項目。One of the replacement character values is not valid because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會搜尋在格式化的字串，指定開始和結束位置之間的第一個可編輯的位置。The method searches for the first editable position in the formatted string between the specified starting and ending positions. 如果找到一個物件，可編輯的位置的值變更為指定的字元， `input`。If one is found, the value of the editable position is changed to the specified character, `input`. 下列任何一個狀況導致發生錯誤狀況来執行取代作業，而值為`false`傳回：Any of the following conditions will result in an error condition that causes no replacement to be performed and a value of `false` to be returned: - `startPos`或`endPos`之前開始的格式化字串，或超出其結束點的參數。The `startPos` or `endPos` parameters point before the start of the formatted string or beyond its end. - 在指定期間內找不到可編輯的字元。An editable character was not found in the specified interval. - 取代字元`input`，因為它不是可列印或不符合對應的遮罩項目不是有效的輸入的字元。The replacement character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element. 除了傳回的值，這個方法會有兩個輸出參數，來提供取代作業的其他資訊。In addition to the return value, this method has two output parameters to supply additional information about the replacement operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會搜尋在格式化的字串，指定開始和結束位置之間的第一個可編輯的位置。The method searches for the first editable position in the formatted string between the specified starting and ending positions. 假設在這個點之後有足夠的可編輯位置上運作，現有的字元值會被取代--一個取代字串參數的內容`input`。Operating on the assumption that there are enough editable positions after this point, the existing character values are replaced one-by-one with the contents of the replacement string parameter, `input`. 下列條件會被視為錯誤。The following conditions are considered errors. 當錯誤發生時，沒有替代項目，就會發生和傳回`false`。When an error occurs, no replacement occurs and returns `false`. - `startPos`或`endPos`之前開始的格式化字串，或超出其結束點的參數。The `startPos` or `endPos` parameters point before the start of the formatted string or beyond its end. - 沒有足夠保存內容的取代字串來格式化字串中可編輯的位置。There are not enough editable positions in the formatted string to hold the contents of the replacement string. - 其中一個取代字元值無效，因為它不是可列印或不符合對應的遮罩項目。One of the replacement character values is not valid because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element. 除了傳回的值，這個方法會有兩個輸出參數，來提供取代作業的其他資訊。In addition to the return value, this method has two output parameters to supply additional information about the replacement operation.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，判斷應如何處理符合提示字元的輸入字元。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how an input character that matches the prompt character should be handled.

value.span: 表示輸入的提示字元會造成遮罩中目前的可編輯位置重設，而 則表示提示字元會當做一般輸入字元處理。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在以特殊方式處理字元、 置和提示字元中，兩個類別目錄。 can treat two categories of characters, paces and prompt characters, in a special manner. 一般來說，每個輸入的字元將經過遮罩，然後針對接受或拒絕。Normally, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected. 假設，以外屬性設定為值`null`，然後設定屬性`true`會導致提示字元的特殊處理。Operating on the assumption that the property is set to a value other than `null`, then setting the property to `true` will result in special processing for the prompt character. 提示字元加入時，它會導致要清除目前的遮罩字元位置和前進至下一個可編輯的字元目前位置。When a prompt character is added, it causes the current mask character position to be cleared and the current position to be advanced to the next editable character. 優先順序高於下表中所述的屬性。 takes precedence over the property as described in the following table. |||產生的行為Resulting behavior| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------| |`true`|`true`|可以加入提示字元，而且它會導致目前的遮罩位置重設。The prompt character can be added and it causes the current mask position to be reset. 預設值。The default.| |`true`|`false`|可以加入提示字元，而且它會導致目前的遮罩位置重設。The prompt character can be added and it causes the current mask position to be reset.| |`false`|`true`|提示字元會當做一般輸入字元處理。The prompt character is processed as a normal input character.| |`false`|`false`|無效的提示字元，嘗試要加入之字元的方法將會失敗。The prompt character is not valid and methods attempting to add the character will fail.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入的遮罩可以包含常值，然後可編輯的字元。Input masks can contain literal and editable characters. 如果嘗試將輸入的字元常值的值所佔用的遮罩中的位置屬性會決定結果。If an attempt is made to add an input character to the position in a mask occupied by a literal, the value of the property determines the result. - 如果這個屬性是`true`，它是有效時，覆寫常值相同的值加入輸入的字元。If this property is `true`, it is valid to overwrite a literal with the same value when adding input characters. 例如，正斜線字元值， `'/'`，無法新增至遮罩的第三個位置`"00/00/000"`。For example, a forward slash character value, `'/'`, could be added to the third position of the mask `"00/00/000"`. - 如果這個屬性是`false`，不是有效的常值字元所佔用的遮罩位置指派任何值。If this property is `false`, it is not valid to assign any value to a mask position occupied by a literal character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的多載方法會傳回格式化的字串開始位置的子字串`startPos`包括後續的數字所指定的字元和`length`參數。This version of the overloaded method returns a substring of the formatted string, starting at the position `startPos` and including the subsequent number of characters specified by the `length` parameter. 傳回的字串包含根據目前的值的常值和提示和屬性，分別。The returned string includes prompts and literals according to the current values of the and properties, respectively. 傳回字串會包含原始輸入的字元。屬性永遠會被忽略。The return string will contain the original input characters; the property is always ignored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法會顯示密碼字元通常保護使用者介面中的資訊，因為它應謹慎小心避免不慎洩露機密的使用者資料。Because this method reveals information that is usually protected in the user interface by password characters, it should be used with extreme caution to avoid accidentally revealing sensitive user data. 輸入參數中有不一致時，請執行下列動作： performs the following actions when there are discrepancies in the input parameters: - 如果`startPos`小於零，開始的位置會設定為零。If `startPos` is less than zero, the starting position is set to zero. - 如果`startPos`大於或等於實際的格式化字串，就會傳回字串。If `startPos` is greater than or equal to the actual of the formatted string, the string is returned. - 如果`length`大於傳回的剩餘字元過去的開始位置，只剩餘字元數。If `length` is greater than the remaining number of characters past the starting position, only the remaining characters are returned. - 如果`length`小於或等於零，就會傳回字串。If `length` is less than or equal to zero, the string is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字元稱為*逸出*如果它是有效的輸入，但未指派至格式化的字串中的位置。A character is said to be *escaped* if it is valid input, but is not assigned to that position in the formatted string. 逸出字元分成下列三個類別：Escaped characters fall into the following three categories: - 提示字元會逸出，如果屬性是`true`。Prompt characters are escaped if the property is `true`. - 輸入的字元的逸出，如果遮罩中相同的值與常值，且如果屬性是`true`。Input characters are escaped if they have the same value as the literal in the mask, and if the property is `true`. - 空格字元會逸出，如果屬性是`true`。Space characters are escaped if the property is `true`. 方法也會傳回`false`如果`pos`參數小於零或大於的。The method will also return `false` if the `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the .
